label: Draft
description: an ECIP that is undergoing rapid iteration and changes

label: Last Call
description: an ECIP that is done with its initial iteration and ready for review by a wide audience

label: Final (non-Core)
description: an ECIP that has been in Last Call for at least 2 weeks and any technical changes that were requested have been addressed by the author

label: Final (Core)
description: an ECIP that the dev teams have decide to implement and release in a future hard fork or has already been released in a hard fork

label: Accepted
description: a core ECIP that has been in Last Call for at least 2 weeks and any technical changes that were requested have been addressed by the author

label: Deferred
description: an ECIP that is not being considered for immediate adoption. May be reconsidered in the future for a subsequent hard fork
